description: Number of double tangents of order n.
references: H. Brocard and T. Lemoyne: Courbes geometriques remarquables (courbes speciales) Planes et Gauches. Tome I, Paris: Albert Blanchard, 1967 [First publ. 1919]; see p. 375.
C.G.J. Jacobi, (Bericht ueber die zur Bekanntmachung geeigneten), Verhandlungen der Koenigl. Preuss. Akademie der Wiss. Berlin, 1850, p. 209, Jun 13, 1850.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
D. Ayala and R. Cavalieri, Counting bitangents with stable maps
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b060784.txt", n, " ", n*(n - 2)*(n - 3)*(n + 3)/2); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 11 2009]
author: Antreas P. Hatzipolakis (xpolakis(AT)otenet.gr), Apr 28 2001
